website_summaries.verdict: With a great high-definition screen, power only rivalled by the Galaxy Note 2, a wealth of great software features and a ridiculously low price, the Google Nexus 4 is almost certainly the best Android device around, never mind the best value.
pros: Latest version of Android Jelly Bean

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone and returned it within the first two weeks. It stopped ringing out loud half the time. And most of the time I had to put it on speaker phone to hear the calls, as 9 out of 10 times they would be absolutely no sound if I put it to my ear. Also notice when using certain apps such as Google Maps, the phone would get incredibly hot. I ended up buying a similarly priced phone the Moto E4, which turned out to be fantastic by Leaps and Bounds. I am so happy I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JoyTop Contributor: DC Comics

customer_reviews.title: It does not work in the UK
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone to use in the UK but it does not work properly. The screen disappears when on call. It does not show back until the other person hangs up. Same thing happens when I get the voice mail. I cannot hang up as the screen gets black. I press the button on the right side of the phone and it does nothing. Voice mails in the UK take several minutes to end so the recording takes several minutes and only then when the voice mail finishes the screen gets back to normal. Also the volume for whatsapp audios is too low that I cannot hear anything it's said.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the used phone
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the used phone. Description was accurate. Works and this is the most important part. Shy on space. You definitely need google drive backup. Have only 1gig left. My music is only 1gig. Everything else is occupied with apps and cache
customer_reviews.author: Iliya S.

customer_reviews.title: She seems happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This phone will be used by my daughter in Israel. She seems happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: alice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product and seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!!! Came fast and just as described and I'm actually typing on it right now!!! Great seller wouldn't hesitate doing business with again
customer_reviews.author: john walencik jr

customer_reviews.title: Still a great choice.
customer_reviews.text: Phone is great. I definitely recommend it to anyone who knows how to update it to Android Nougat with a Non official ROM. Specs are pretty much better than all other phones ranging in this price.
customer_reviews.author: JoanG

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Just great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Just great! The Nexus device is unlocked, no problem. Everything works well. The only issue is: this Nexus doesn't accept MicroSD. It comes just with the internal memory.
customer_reviews.author: OHiggins Reinoso

customer_reviews.title: ... cell does not work as well as i would like and there is a issue upgrading to the newest ...
customer_reviews.text: The cell does not work as well as i would like and there is a issue upgrading to the newest OS apart from that...fast shipping well packaged
customer_reviews.author: HB Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: Quite clear screen with affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Quite clear screen. This device met end of support by Google, and OS does NOT get security update anymore. So, if privacy is concern, buy more recent device. Except that, quite good at affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: UN HA KIMTop Contributor: Astronomy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor signal reception
customer_reviews.text: signal comes and goes, appears to be ongoing problem with this phone. My previous phone with same provider had good service in same area. My Wife's phone sitting beside mine gets good signal.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: invest in a better phone
customer_reviews.text: this doesnt work for many apps and it shuts down if you turn it over. I have had to replace the battery multiple times and it still doesnt work. if you can, invest in a better phone
customer_reviews.author: alliejoe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Phone, I was leery to switch from my ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Phone, I was leery to switch from my galaxy s3, but this one seems to run much better. Better photos also!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P. Haw

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous Price
customer_reviews.text: Anyone who thinks the price is worth the phone is crazy... It's good, but not that good. You can buy the nexus 5 from Google for less, and the nexus 6 is only about $170 more than this price. Not worth it. Phone is too old.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Tatlow

customer_reviews.title: Great phone for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great phone for the price. The specs are on par with other great phones in the market. I really love it. Waiting for Lollipop to come out so I can get the update for this phone.
customer_reviews.author: mdatta

customer_reviews.title: just a bit outside...
customer_reviews.text: 200 $!!!!!!!!!! WHAT???? AND ITS USED!!!!! YOU CAN GET A NEXUS 5 FOR LESS... lol... get real.
customer_reviews.author: Mark gorzka

customer_reviews.title: Pure Android Experience!!
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. By far one of the best phones I have ever used. Also very affordable unlike some other flagship phones that cost an arm and a leg.
customer_reviews.author: John Snow

customer_reviews.title: not a bad phone but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: So first off I should say that I had this phone for over 2 years. Pros. Pretty decent specs for a device that came out a few years ago. Very durable. Never had anything break even tho I dropped it more then a dozen times. Cons. Terrible battery life. By the end I was charging it twice a day with minimal use. And that's after I switched batts more then once No SD card slot and not enough internal storage, I was always backing things up and deleting them because my storage was full. Overall a pretty durable phone but has its flaws
customer_reviews.author: Jake Reber

product_meta.title: LG Nexus 4 E960 Phone 8 GB GSM Unlocked Black
feature_bullets: Browsing the Web is a breeze with the Google Nexus 4 cell phone, as it has a 1.5 GHz quad-core processor
A smart keyboard on this 16 GB Google Nexus predicts the next word to finish the entire sentence, making messaging easy
A 4.7-inch Corning Gorilla Glass 2 screen brings the images to life
Featuring Google Maps, 3D Maps, turn-by-turn GPS navigation, and more, this smartphone (unlocked) makes finding places simple

With Android Beam, the Google Nexus 4 cell phone allows you to share photos, videos, applications, and contacts in a jiffy. And, to capture every detail, you can use the 8 MP camera of this black Google Nexus smartphone
